posts.title: Metal Hand Guitar Grip
posts.content: Is there anything more metal than resting your mighty axe on the metal hand guitar grip? This heavy duty metal hand is built to handle the weight of any guitar or bass and can be installed in various places so you can rest your instrument like a mighty rock god.

posts.title: Naughty Outlet Cover Decal
posts.content: The sparks between the couple on the naughty outlet cover decal are undeniable. This raunchy decal’s risque design converts any dull outlet into a comical portrait of a couple getting down and dirty; no dorm room or bachelor pad would be complete without it.

posts.title: Caramel Apple Candy Dipper
posts.content: Turn a healthy snack into an artery clogging treat with the caramel apple candy dipper. This 27 oz. dipping pot features a wrap around tray designed to facilitate adhering toppings without making a mess while also keeping caramel at the ideal dipping temperature.

posts.title: Dust Mopping Slippers
posts.content: Get some cleaning done around the house without lifting a finger with these dust mopping slippers. You can even up your cleaning efficiency by freeing your hands for other cleaning jobs while you effortlessly clean the floors just by walking around.

posts.title: iPhone Joystick
posts.content: Level up as a gamer when you begin using the iPhone joystick to take your mobile gaming to new heights. The joystick is compatible with thousands of games and allows for more precise movement during game play. You’ll be breaking high scores in almost every game.

posts.title: Smart Outdoor Security Light
posts.content: Add an extra layer of defense onto your home by installing this smart outdoor security light at your front door. It provides ample lighting, and features a built-in camera capable of live streaming video, so you can see who’s outside your home.

posts.title: Where’s The Wookie Book
posts.content: Put your bounty-hunting skills to the test as you try to locate Chewbacca inside the pages of the Where’s The Wookie book. It’s up to you to scour places like the Jawa market and Ewok village in order to find and capture this notorious Rebel scum.

posts.title: Dumbbell Alarm Clock
posts.content: Get on the fast track to a better body by waking up to the dumbbell alarm clock. Instead of simply hitting a snooze or off button, this unique clock forces you to get up and perform 30 grueling reps before it will ever turn off.

posts.title: Smartphone Thermal Imaging Device
posts.content: Get an enhanced view of the world around you by turning your smartphone into a thermal imaging device. This lightweight accessory displays live thermal infrared imagery through your phone so you can see things from a thermal perspective.

posts.title: Curved Shower Rod
posts.content: Give yourself a little extra room in the shower without needing to perform costly renovations by installing this curved shower curtain. Designed to fit 99% of all showers, the clever curved design of the rod adds up to 25% extra room in the shower.

posts.title: Ink Dot Generating Electronic Pen
posts.content: Create amazing pointilist masterpieces using this ink dot generating electronic pen. The pen features a specialized tip that repeatedly pulsates up and down to create 600 ink dots per minute so that you can stipple up to 10 times faster and reduce wrist fatigue.

posts.title: Pop-Up USB Socket
posts.content: The inspired and functional design of this pop-up USB makes it possible to keep a handy socket nearby without sacrificing valuable counter space. When not in use, this vertical socket will easily hide underneath the counter.
